author: wn.com
title: Comment: Apprenticeships are a vital strand of education (The University of Sheffield)
text: ( Source : The University of Sheffield ) Vice-Chancellor Professor Sir Keith Burnett responds to a new study by the Sutton Trust (published 9 October 2015 ) which highlights the value of high-quality apprenticeships. By Professor Sir Keith
